name: BPC-157 + TB-500 Combo
overview: A popular combination of BPC-157 and TB-500 used together for synergistic effects on tissue repair and recovery. Many protocols combine these peptides based on their complementary mechanisms - BPC-157 for localized healing and TB-500 for systemic recovery support.
who_should_avoid: active malignancy or history of hormone-sensitive cancers
those who should avoid either individual peptide
interactions_notes: Limited data on combination interactions. May have additive effects. Review medications and supplements with clinician. If either individual peptide is contraindicated, the combination should be avoided.
dosing_ranges_literature: Common protocols combine BPC-157 (250-500 mcg) with TB-500 (2-5 mg) administered together or separately. Frequency varies from daily to 2-3 times per week. Some protocols alternate peptides. Clinical guidance is essential as dosing is not standardized.
storage_notes: Store unreconstituted peptides in freezer (-20Â°C or colder). After reconstitution with bacteriostatic water, store refrigerated and use within 2-3 weeks. May be mixed in same syringe or administered separately.
